title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.17 - Obedience to parkway police officer or authority employee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.17 - Obedience to parkway police officer or authority employee

State Regulations

No person shall, within the parkway system, neglect or
refuse to comply with or obey the direction or command indicated by gesture or
otherwise, of any parkway police officer or department
employee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
182.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
